==Trivia==
* Savinien is the name of {{w|Cyrano de Bergerac}} (Savinien de Cyrano de Bergerac). Cyrano wrote a play featuring Christian de Neuvillette, a basis for Neuvillette's name (see [[Neuvillette/Lore#Etymology|Trivia]]).
